Contributor: Britton, L. N., artist.; Latham Litho & Ptg. Co., lithographer, printer.;
Note: Signed "L.N. Britton." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Horizontal.
Description: Text says to contribute to the Red Cross War Fund. Illustration shows the backs of people looking toward symbols of liberty, such as the Statue of Liberty, and the Red Cross symbol.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Publisher: New York : Latham Litho & Ptg. Co.,

Title: Are you one of us?
